page.title: 08SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: School dinners have changed considerably over the past few years. Up until about five years ago, we all had to eat exactly the same dinners but then everything changed and we began to have a very wide choice of meal. Then, a few months ago, things changed again and now we only get a choice of a Mini (50p) or a Maxi (70p) meal but we do have a snack shop where we can buy rolls, sandwiches and chips. We can also buy sweets and drinks. Many children bring their own sandwiches as the prices of our dinners have gone up and up. At Christmas, the cooks do a Christmas dinner which costs 70p. I asked four of my friends what they thought of school dinners and they said "Rubbery","Revolting,but good chips", "Allright except for faggots" and "Just vile!"
